term.title: affinity chromatography

item.text: An expression characterizing the particular variant of chromatography in which the unique biological specificity of the analyte and ligand interaction is utilized for the separation.

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 145 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)
